name: Switcle Candy Jump
description:
Switcle Candy Jump is an addictive, colorful, challenging, and a fantastic game. It will test your steadiness, accuracy, patience, and timing.

- Avoid obstacles and bombs to reach the top.
- Collect as many berries as you can to unlock new fruit.
- Beat your friends and earning the high score.

Fun for all ages. Test your skills and get your sweet tooth satisfied today!
